title: AuthorizationService
description:
This Feature provides access control for the implementing server.

    It specifies the SiLA Client Metadata for the access token, that has been provided by the
    AuthenticationService core Feature.

metadata.title: AccessToken
metadata.description: Token to be sent with every call in order to get access to the SiLA Server functionality.

AccessToken.title: AccessToken
AccessToken.description: Token to be sent with every call in order to get access to the SiLA Server functionality.

definedExecutionErrors.title: InvalidAccessToken
definedExecutionErrors.description: The sent access token is not valid.
